languages.text: At the start of the Assassin's turn, all enemies that do not have the Assassin in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} suffer the {g|f:9872e38c87be4e4eb15dbc9fd5c53649}unsuspecting{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} until the end of the Assassin's turn.
languages.original_text: В начале хода ассасина все противники, для которых ассасин находится вне зоны {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}видимости{/g}, получают {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}эффект{/g} "можно застать врасплох", который сохраняется до конца хода ассасина. Можно застать врасплох: атакуя противника, на которого действует этот эффект, ассасин получает +7% к {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}шанс попадания{/g} и +7% к шансу {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критического попадания{/g}.

traits.locale_text: At the start of the Assassin's turn, all enemies that do not have the Assassin in their line of sight gain the unsuspecting effect until the end of the Assassin's turn. Unsuspecting: The Assassin gains +15% hit chance and +15% critical hit chance against unsuspecting enemies.

At the start of the Assassin's turn, all enemies that do not have the Assassin in their line of sight suffer the unsuspecting effect until the end of the Assassin's turn. Unsuspecting: The Assassin gains +15% hit chance and +15% critical hit chance against unsuspecting enemies.

At the start of the Assassin's turn, all enemies that do not have the Assassin in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} suffer the unsuspecting {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} until the end of the Assassin's turn. Unsuspecting: the Assassin gains +7% {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} and +7% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} against unsuspecting enemies.

At the start of the Assassin's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, all enemies that do not have the Assassin in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} suffer the unsuspecting effect until the end of the Assassin's turn. Unsuspecting: The Assassin gains +7% {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}hit chance{/g} and +7% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} against unsuspecting enemies.

At the start of the Assassin's turn, all enemies that do not have the Assassin in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} suffer the unsuspecting {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} until the end of the Assassin's turn. Unsuspecting: the Assassin gains +7% {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} and +7% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} against unsuspecting enemies.

languages.text: В начале хода ассасина все противники, для которых ассасин находится вне зоны {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}видимости{/g}, получают {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}эффект{/g} {g|f:9872e38c87be4e4eb15dbc9fd5c53649}можно застать врасплох{/g}, который сохраняется до конца хода ассасина.
languages.original_text: At the start of the Assassin's turn, all enemies that do not have the Assassin in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} suffer the {g|f:9872e38c87be4e4eb15dbc9fd5c53649}unsuspecting{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} until the end of the Assassin's turn.

traits.locale_text: В начале хода ассасина все противники, для которых ассасин находится вне зоны {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}видимости{/g}, получают {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}эффект{/g} {g|f:9872e38c87be4e4eb15dbc9fd5c53649}можно застать врасплох{/g}, который сохраняется до конца хода ассасина.

В начале хода ассасина все противники, для которых ассасин находится вне зоны видимости, получают эффект "можно застать врасплох", который сохраняется до конца хода ассасина. Можно застать врасплох: атакуя противника, на которого действует этот эффект, ассасин получает +15% к шансу попадания и +15% к шансу критического попадания.

languages.text: 刺客的回合开始时，所有{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}视线{/g}内看不到刺客的敌人，都会受到{g|f:9872e38c87be4e4eb15dbc9fd5c53649}“毫无戒备”{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}效果{/g}影响，直到刺客的回合结束。
languages.original_text: At the start of the Assassin's turn, all enemies that do not have the Assassin in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} suffer the {g|f:9872e38c87be4e4eb15dbc9fd5c53649}unsuspecting{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} until the end of the Assassin's turn.

traits.locale_text: 刺客的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，所有{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}视线{/g}内看不到刺客的敌人，都会受到“毫无戒备”效果影响，直到刺客的回合结束。 毫无戒备：刺客攻击毫无戒备的敌人时，获得+15%{g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}命中率{/g}与+15%{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击率{/g}。

{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}刺客{/g}的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，所有{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}视线{/g}内看不到刺客的敌人，都会受到“毫无戒备”效果影响，直到刺客的回合结束。 毫无戒备：刺客攻击毫无戒备的敌人时，获得+7%{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中率{/g}与+7%{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击率{/g}。

languages.text: Al comienzo del turno del asesino, todos los enemigos que no lo tengan dentro de su {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}línea de visión{/g} sufren el {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}efecto{/g} {g|f:9872e38c87be4e4eb15dbc9fd5c53649}desprevenido{/g} hasta el final del turno del asesino.
languages.original_text: At the start of the Assassin's turn, all enemies that do not have the Assassin in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} suffer the {g|f:9872e38c87be4e4eb15dbc9fd5c53649}unsuspecting{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} until the end of the Assassin's turn.

traits.locale_text: Al comienzo del {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}asesino{/g}, todos los enemigos que no lo tengan dentro de su {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}línea de visión{/g} sufren el efecto desprevenido hasta el final del turno del asesino. Desprevenido: El asesino gana un +7 % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}probabilidad de impacto{/g} y un +7 % de {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}probabilidad de impacto crítico{/g} contra enemigos desprevenidos.

languages.text: Zu Beginn des Assassinen-Zugs erleiden alle Feinde, die den Assassinen nicht in ihrer {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}Sichtlinie{/g} haben, bis zum Ende des Zugs des Assassinen den {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}Effekt{/g} {g|f:9872e38c87be4e4eb15dbc9fd5c53649}Ahnungslos{/g}.
languages.original_text: At the start of the Assassin's turn, all enemies that do not have the Assassin in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} suffer the {g|f:9872e38c87be4e4eb15dbc9fd5c53649}unsuspecting{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} until the end of the Assassin's turn.

traits.locale_text: Zu Beginn des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassinen{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} erleiden alle Feinde, die den Assassinen nicht in ihrer {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}Sichtlinie{/g} haben, bis zum Ende des Zugs des Assassinen den Effekt Ahnungslos. Ahnungslos: Der Assassine erhält +7 % {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Trefferchance{/g} und +7 % {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritische Trefferchance{/g} gegen ahnungslose Feinde.

languages.text: Au début du tour de l'assassin, tous les ennemis qui ne l'ont pas dans leur {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}ligne de mire{/g} subissent l'{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effet{/g} {g|f:9872e38c87be4e4eb15dbc9fd5c53649}Insoupçonnable{/g} jusqu'à la fin du tour de l'assassin.
languages.original_text: At the start of the Assassin's turn, all enemies that do not have the Assassin in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} suffer the {g|f:9872e38c87be4e4eb15dbc9fd5c53649}unsuspecting{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} until the end of the Assassin's turn.

traits.locale_text: Au début du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} de l'Assassin, tous les ennemis qui ne l'ont pas dans leur {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}ligne de mire{/g} subissent l'effet Insoupçonnable jusqu'à la fin du tour. Insoupçonnable : l'Assassin bénéficie de +15 % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}chances d'infliger un coup{/g} et de +15 % de {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}chances d'infliger un coup critique{/g} aux ennemis qui ne soupçonnent pas sa présence.

languages.text: アサシンのターン開始時、アサシンを{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}視界内{/g}に入れていないすべての敵は、アサシンのターン終了まで「無防備」{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}効果{/g}を受ける。 疑念：「無防備」状態の敵に対するアサシンの{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中率{/g}+7%、{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカル命中率{/g}+7%を獲得。
languages.original_text: At the start of the Assassin's turn, all enemies that do not have the Assassin in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} suffer the unsuspecting {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} until the end of the Assassin's turn. Unsuspecting: the Assassin gains +7% {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} and +7% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} against unsuspecting enemies.

traits.locale_text: アサシンのターン開始時、アサシンを{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}視界内{/g}に入れていないすべての敵は、アサシンのターン終了まで「無防備」{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}効果{/g}を受ける。 疑念：「無防備」状態の敵に対するアサシンの{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中率{/g}+7%、{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカル命中率{/g}+7%を獲得。

{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}アサシン{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時、アサシンを{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}視界内{/g}に入れていないすべての敵は、アサシンのターン終了まで「無防備」効果を受ける。 疑念：「無防備」状態の敵に対するアサシンの{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中率{/g}+7%、{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカル命中率{/g}+7%

languages.text: Suikastçı'nın turu başladığında {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}görüş hattında{/g} o Suikastçı bulunmayan tüm düşmanlar, {g|f:9872e38c87be4e4eb15dbc9fd5c53649}hazırlıksız{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}etkisine{/g} kapılırlar. Bu etki, Suikastçı'nın turu bitene dek sürer.
